item.title: 11Welcome to Kremer Media
item.dc:creator: kremerdesignadmin
item.content:encoded:
What we do:

Print Design Web Design Branding Wordpress Writing Editing

item.title: Welcome to Kremer Design
item.dc:creator: kremerdesignadmin
item.content:encoded:
We’re a full-service one-stop graphic design shop, based in San Francisco, CA serving all of your Web and print design needs. Logos, posters, brochures, business cards, postcards–we’ve got you covered. Or perhaps you need a simple–or complex–website created and even managed; no problem. We can do that, too. A complete branding experience? Let’s talk. Send a quick email and we’ll get the process started. Email me with a hello, or an inquiry for your design needs: ben@kremerdesign.com Thanks for stopping by, Ben Kremer Our clients include:
  • Medical Practices
  • Lawyers
  • Yoga Studios
  • Writers
  • Tech Companies
  • Promoters
  • Non-Profits
  • Marketing Consultants
  • ...and many others
Prior to becoming a designer (and during the early years of my career), I was an elite level athlete competing in biathlon (nordic skiing and rifle marksmanship), and later a coach, bringing athletes all the way to the Vancouver Olympic Games. I’m a seasoned graphic designer, having worked with both web and print, along with website construction and management. I enjoy the challenge of new projects and have designed sites, logos and advertisements for athletes, online magazines, fashion companies and medical corporations. I have lived and traveled abroad, and am fluent in German. Innovatively green: I've converted diesel engine vehicles to run on vegetable oil.

item.title: Flash
item.dc:creator: kremerdesignadmin
item.content:encoded:
Flash services include:
  • Custom video playback
  • Website banner advertisements
  • Special invitations
  • Touch-screen kiosks
  • Training modules
  • Custom slideshows
  • Video enabled e-newsletters

item.title: Web
item.dc:creator: kremerdesignadmin
item.content:encoded:
Perhaps you need a simple—or complex—website created and even managed; it's no problem, big or small. Other web-based services available:
  • Website programming and maintenance contracts
  • Database integration
  • Custom website templates (HTML, WordPress, Joomla, etc.)
  • Custom email templates
  • Content Management Systems (CMS)
  • Search engine optimization (SEO)
  • iOS programming - iphone and ipad applications
We also provide domain registration and affordable and secure hosting for your website.

item.title: Print
item.dc:creator: kremerdesignadmin
item.content:encoded:
A few examples of our products:
  • Logos, business cards, letterhead, and envelopes
  • Postcards, brochures
  • Advertisements, posters, and banners
  • Magazine layouts, annual reports, newsletters, catalogs and books
  • Wedding announcements, invitations, thank you cards
Concept design to final production

item.title: Branding
item.dc:creator: kremerdesignadmin
item.content:encoded:
Starting a new business, or re-invigorating your current endeavor? We can help strengthen how your customers and clients perceive your business, capitalizing on consistency through logo and style themes from your business cards to your products and services in the marketplace.

We create marketing and brand communications strategies that will appropriately focus on your target markets.
